import axios from 'axios' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const Edit = () => { const [values,setValues]={ name:"", type:"", status:"", date:"" } const {id}=useParams(); useEffect(()=>{ axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/api/equipment/${id}`) .then(resp=>{ setValues(resp.data) }) .catch(err=>console.log(err)); },[]); return(






View
) } export default Edit
